title: Ticket #7525: Remove unused Service * params to c style DC callbacks
description: When we register Daemon Core c-style command,timer, socket, pipe and reaper callbacks, the daemon core interface allows us to pass in a pointer to a Service object. This is never used, and just causes overhead to ignore. Also, we almost universally cast the c function (or static C++ method) in the register call, even though we never need to. This ticket fixes these problems.
remarks:
